case.title: seeking nice female for rewarding friendship - 39 (NYC)
case.text:
gentleman looking to help out a female who needs help with a few monetary problems. Some promiscuous company in exchange for some fun :)
I'm looking for someone who is new to this and curious as to what this involves. not looking for anything cold or business like, but someone who will be ok with maybe meeting a new friend who also helps out here and there. Basically we just help each other out and have some fun. I am quite serious and would like to meet on a regular basis
Please send an email with some details about yourself. A few recent photos would be appreciated as well
